text: Ne Nyasaye yabaloonga enywe okhurula khuliloba.. mana nende okhurulana nende indonyande yamatsi kolwibulo mana nabakhola okhuba Abasatsa nende Abakhasi, ne Omukhasi yesiyesi shachinganga inda nohomba shiyebulanga tawe halali khubumanyi bubwe. Ne shahelesibwa olubaka lwokhumenya nohomba akhututuyilibwa olubaka lulwe tawe, halali koosi kali mushitabu. Toto ako ni amangu khu Nyasaye
